fusilli.utils.training_utilsÔÉÅ

init_validation_tqdm()[source]ÔÉÅ

Override this to customize the tqdm bar for validation.

get_checkpoint_filename_for_trained_fusion_model(params, model, checkpoint_file_suffix, fold=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Get the checkpoint filename for the trained fusion model using the model object. Checkpoints should follow the naming convention: fusion_model_name_fold_k_{checkpoint_file_suffix} if fold is not None fusion_model_name_{checkpoint_file_suffix} if fold is None

Parameters:

  • params (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of parameters.

  • model (object) ‚Äì BaseModel model object.

  • checkpoint_file_suffix (str) ‚Äì Checkpoint file suffix.

  • fold (int) ‚Äì Fold number. Default None.

Returns:

Checkpoint filename.

Return type:

checkpoint_filename (str)

get_checkpoint_filenames_for_subspace_models(subspace_method, k=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Get the checkpoint filenames for the subspace models.

Parameters:

subspace_method (class) ‚Äì Subspace method class. Called from the subspace method class with self.

Returns:

List of checkpoint filenames. One for each subspace model.

Return type:

checkpoint_filenames (list)

get_file_suffix_from_dict(extra_log_string_dict)[source]ÔÉÅ

Get the extra name string and tags from the extra_log_string_dict.

Parameters:

extra_log_string_dict (dict) ‚Äì Extra string to add to the run name. e.g. if you‚Äôre running the same model with different hyperparameters, you can add the hyperparameters. Input format {‚Äúname‚Äù: ‚Äúvalue‚Äù}. In the run name, the extra string will be added as ‚Äúname_value‚Äù. And a tag will be added as ‚Äúname_value‚Äù.

Returns:

Extra name string to add to the some path name. extra_tags (list): List of extra tags to add to the logged run (wandb).

Return type:

extra_name_string (str)

get_final_val_metrics(trainer)[source]ÔÉÅ

Get the final validation metrics from the trainer object.

Parameters:

  • metric_names (list) ‚Äì List of metric names.

  • trainer (object) ‚Äì Pytorch lightning trainer object.

Returns:

Final validation metric 1. metric2 (float): Final validation metric 2.

Return type:

metric1 (float)

init_trainer(logger, params, max_epochs=1000, enable_checkpointing=True, checkpoint_filename=None, own_early_stopping_callback=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Initialize the pytorch lightning trainer object.

Parameters:

  • logger (object) ‚Äì Pytorch lightning logger object.

  • params (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of parameters.

  • max_epochs (int) ‚Äì Maximum number of epochs.

  • enable_checkpointing (bool) ‚Äì Whether to enable checkpointing. If True, then checkpoints will be saved. We use False for the example notebooks in the repository/documentation.

  • checkpoint_filename (str) ‚Äì Checkpoint filename. Default None if using default checkpointing.

  • own_early_stopping_callback (object) ‚Äì Own early stopping callback object. Default None to use default early stopping callback. If you want to use your own early stopping callback, then you need to define it in the main training script and pass it here or pass into the datamodule object and then it will read it from there.

Returns:

Pytorch lightning trainer object.

Return type:

trainer (object)

set_checkpoint_name(params, fusion_model, fold=None, extra_log_string_dict=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Set the checkpoint name for the current run of the main fusion model.

Parameters:

  • params (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of parameters.

  • fusion_model (class) ‚Äì Fusion model class.

  • fold (int) ‚Äì Fold number. Default None.

  • extra_log_string_dict (dict) ‚Äì Extra string to add to the run name. e.g. if you‚Äôre running the same model with different hyperparameters, you can add the hyperparameters. Input format {‚Äúname‚Äù: ‚Äúvalue‚Äù}. In the run name, the extra string will be added as ‚Äúname_value‚Äù. And a tag will be added as ‚Äúname_value‚Äù. Default None.

Returns:

Checkpoint filename.

Return type:

checkpoint_filename (str)

set_logger(params, fold, fusion_model, extra_log_string_dict=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Set the logger for the current run. If params[‚Äúlog‚Äù] is True, then the logger is set to WandbLogger, otherwise it is set to None.

Parameters:

  • params (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of parameters.

  • fold (int) ‚Äì Fold number.

  • fusion_model (class) ‚Äì Fusion model class.

  • extra_string_dict (dict) ‚Äì Extra string to add to the run name. e.g. if you‚Äôre running the same model with different hyperparameters, you can add the hyperparameters. Input format {‚Äúname‚Äù: ‚Äúvalue‚Äù}. In the run name, the extra string will be added as ‚Äúname_value‚Äù. And a tag will be added as ‚Äúname_value‚Äù.

Returns:

Pytorch lightning logger object.

Return type:

logger (object)
